product_name: Inov8 Road-X Lite 155 Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Inov8 Road-X Lite 155 men's road-running shoes are an efficient racing and training shoe for runners who enjoy a minimalist fit and feel. Breathable polyester mesh uppers feature thermoplastic urethane overlays for support. Polyester linings offer moisture management to keep feet dry and comfortable. Injection-molded EVA midsoles offer lightweight support and cushioning; 6mm heel-to-toe drop gives a low-to-ground foot position. Dynamic polymer bands run the length of feet, giving support and a kick of energy with every step. The Inov8 Road-X 155 running shoes feature blended EVA and synthetic rubber outsoles that are lightweight yet durable.
short_description: The Inov8 Road-X Lite 155 men's road-running shoes are an efficient racing and training shoe for runners who enjoy a minimalist fit and feel.
